doc:
John Penrose (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Penrose_(actor) 0 John Penrose (5 May 1914 – 22 May 1983) was a British actor. After graduating from RADA in 1936, he made his London stage debut the following year in Old Music at the St. James' Theatre.His best-known role was in the 1949 film Kind Hearts and Coronets, where he played Lionel, Sibella's dull husband whom Louis was accused of murdering. John_Penrose ( 5_May_1914 – 22_May_1983 ) was a_British_actor . After graduating from RADA in 1936 , he made his_London_stage_debut the_following_year in Old_Music at the_St._James '_Theatre.His_best-known_role was in the_1949_film_Kind_Hearts_and_Coronets , where he played Lionel , Sibella 's_dull_husband whom Louis was_accused of murdering .
